actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the U.S. Postal Service should allocate sufficient resources to carry out its research and development program.

summary.text: States that the Postal Service should place maximum emphasis upon research and development, especially in the field of electronic communications.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the U.S. Postal Service should allocate sufficient resources to carry out its research and development program.
